basic.description: This fieldwork course will allow students to explore opportunities for the development of occupational therapy services in potential settings within the community. Co-requisite: OT-861* or permission of the course coordinator; Prerequisites: OT-847 or permission of the course coordinator.
basic.subject: OT
basic.title: Community Development (CR6)

extra.enrollment_requirement: OT862:(Corequisite OT861 or permission of course coordinator) and (Prerequisite OT847 of permission of course coordinator)
